title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 387: Game 7's, Playoff Previews & Murls
description:
On Episode 387 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are once again joined by Matt Murley. Murls joins from Sweden to wrap up the craziness of the 1st round. Was this the craziest 1st round in NHL history? The guys break down all the Game 7’s and what went wrong for Toronto, Pittsburgh, Boston, and all the other teams who are on the golf course today. Biz also says his goodbye to his Leafs, while RA and Grinnell discuss the Bruins future.The boys wrap up with previews for Colorado vs St. Louis, The Battle of Alberta, Rangers vs Canes and The Battle of Florida.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
